mapper.select: SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.INSERT_TIME, I.DELETE_YN, U.ID, I.USER_IDX, I.COUNT, I.FILE_ID, I.FILE_NAME, I.FILE_TYPE, I.FILE_DATA FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND I.USER_IDX = U.IDX

SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.INSERT_TIME, I.DELETE_YN, U.IDX, U.ID, I.COUNT, I.FILE_ID, I.FILE_NAME, I.FILE_TYPE, I.FILE_DATA FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND I.USER_IDX = U.IDX AND I.TITLE = #{title}
SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.INSERT_TIME, I.DELETE_YN, U.ID, U.IDX, I.COUNT FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND I.USER_IDX = U.IDX AND I.IDX = #{idx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE INFORM SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE INFORM SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.USER_IDX, I.INSERT_TIME, U.ID, U.PROFILEURL, I.FILE_ID, I.FILE_NAME, I.FILE_TYPE, I.FILE_DATA FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.FILE_ID = #{fileId} AND I.USER_IDX = U.IDX

SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.USER_IDX, I.INSERT_TIME, U.ID, U.PROFILEURL, I.FILE_ID, I.FILE_NAME, I.FILE_TYPE, I.FILE_DATA, I.COUNT FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.IDX = #{idx} AND I.USER_IDX = U.IDX AND I.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT I.IDX, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.USER_IDX, I.INSERT_TIME, U.ID, U.PROFILEURL, I.FILE_ID, I.FILE_NAME, I.FILE_TYPE, I.FILE_DATA, I.COUNT FROM INFORM I, USERS U WHERE I.USER_IDX = U.IDX AND I.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM INFORM ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFORM ( IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_IDX, FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, FILE_DATA ) VALUES ( SQ_INFORM.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{userIdx}, SQ_INFORM_FILES.NEXTVAL, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileData} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORM_REPLY IR, INFORM I WHERE IR.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND I.IDX = IR.INFORM_IDX AND IR.INFORM_IDX = #{boardIdx}
